name: lender_required_repairs_days
title: Within how many days after acceptance will you deliver a list of lender required repairs?
label: Repairs Days
description: This list will be provided by your FHA or VA lender.
tips: The list of required repairs helps identify necessary property improvements required by your lender.
small_print: The repair list must be provided within the specified timeframe to maintain loan approval status.

internal.notes: Days to provide lender required repairs list

lender_required_repairs_days.name: lender_required_repairs_days

suggested.hint: The input value falls outside of suggested values

lender_required_repairs_days.tooltip: Enter the number of days to deliver repair list
